title: Freedom
creator_credit: Bob Gatherum, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: During his trip back to Normandy on the 65th anniversary of D-day, Bob Gatherum reflects on the lasting legacy of war. Travelling through Normandy, he was surprised and amazed at the appreciation shown by the local people whose freedom he and his fellow soldiers had helped protect.
creator_credit_for_label: Bob Gatherum, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
